    • Method Detail

      • products

        public play.mvc.Result products()
        GET all products in the database
        Returns:
        The information of all Product in JSON format

      • product

        public play.mvc.Result product(long id)
        GET the product in the database with his ID if it exist
        Parameters:
        id - The id of a Product
        Returns:
        The information of a Product in JSON format
        If the product exist, return 200 Ok
        with the product Else return 404 Not Found

      • productCreate

        public play.mvc.Result productCreate()
        CREATE a product in the database with the values of the FORM
        Returns:
        The product is created
        If the person is not a seller or an admin, return 404 Not Found
        Else return 201 Created

      • productUpdate

        public play.mvc.Result productUpdate(long id)
        Update a product with the data in the form
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the product to update
        Returns:
        The information of a Product in JSON format
        If the product doesn't exist in the database, return 404 Not Found
        Else return 200 Ok with the product

      • productDelete

        public play.mvc.Result productDelete(long id)
        DELETE a product in the database with his ID
        Parameters:
        id - The id of a Product
        Returns:
        If the product doesn't exist in the dababase, return 404 Not Found
        Else return 200 Ok

      • addToBasket

        public play.mvc.Result addToBasket(long id)
        Add a product in the basket of the buyer.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the product
        Returns:
        If the product doesn't exist, return 404 Not Found
        Else if the quantity is not ok, 409 Conflict Else return 200 Ok
